name: Goblin McGoblinFace VR
description:
Goblin McGoblinFace VR is a tower-defense, wave-based virtual reality game where you assume the role of a wizard, equipped with a book of spells that summons fireballs to your hands. You must protect your magic castle by using your fireballs to annihilate an endless horde of goblins trying to break in.

Credits:

- Jason Pham

- Corvyn Kusuma

- Don Nakashima

- Li Yunjia

- Albert Gao
